title: "White House: Big Tech bosses told to protect public from AI risks"
excerpt: "Tech bosses were summoned to the White House on Thursday and told they must protect the public from the dangers of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Sundar Pichai of Google, Satya Nadella of Microsoft, and OpenAI's Sam Altmann were told they had a \"moral\" duty to safeguard society."
